title: Keen on G4tv again
content:
Keen was shown on mondays edition of Attack of the show (formally The screen savers) and they showed off the online port of Keen 1 which I believe there is a link on the main site. I've already known of the link on cerberal Cortex 314's links section and I found it entertaining for the hosts to be reminincing of playing Keen in the past.Check out my blog at [url=http://spaces.msn.com/members/superadammario/]spaces.msn.com/members/superadammario/[/url]
Check out my fanfics at [url=http://www.fanfiction.net/u/680124/]fanfiction.net[/url]

title: Re: Keen on G4tv again
content: That's pretty cool! Too bad we probably won't get any screens. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!
